cause.description:
Remedy is what its name states... a cure a solution to a problem. Africa is in desperate need of a remedy. Too many people have suffered and too many have died.. I can't sit here any longer watching it happen so Remedy will be the change i want to see in this world
1. Africa is in desperate need of a remedy
2. We as humans not as Americans have an obligation to do everything possible to help anyone in need
3. Unnecessary death and starvation can be stopped
cause.mission: Be the force behind the cure
cause.name: REMEDY
